author: decrypt.co
title: Michael Saylor's Strategy Makes Smallest Bitcoin Buy in 10 Weeks
description:
In brief
- Strategy said that it recently acquired Bitcoin worth about $75 million.
- The Tysons Corner, Virginia firm holds more than $60 billion in Bitcoin.
- Strategy also said that it sold $74 million worth of preferred stock through an at-the-money offer…
